name: Cobi Hoops 2
description:
Cobi Hoops is back with awesome puzzle action! Now everyone can shoot hoops!

Can you score all the baskets in these amazing puzzle levels and take your sweet skills to the next level?

Discover 160+ levels of fun or play against friends inside Messages to see how many baskets you can score in 30 seconds!

More
Discover more amazing Cobra Mobile games at www.cobramobile.com

Support
Having problems? Visit www.cobramobile.com/support to see if we can help
